articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Andrew Cuomo is trying to stall on sexual harassment allegations. It won't work.
articles.description: Faced with two allegations of sexual harassment by former employees, New York Democratic Gov. Andrew Cuomo did what many politicians embroiled by scandal try to do: He bought himself some time.
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

articles.title: Bill Gates on the Democratic stimulus bill
articles.description: Fareed Zakaria asks Bill Gates whether he thinks the $1.9 trillion Covid stimulus package passed by the US House of Representatives is excessive or well calibrated.

articles.author: Charles Riley, CNN Business
articles.title: Top European media outlet refuses to join Facebook News
articles.description: Facebook is launching its news product in Germany without media giant Axel Springer, which publishes the country's most popular daily newspaper and says it won't participate due to the "inappropriately low remuneration" offered for journalistic content.

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: United, predicting a rebound in travel, buys 25 Boeing 737 Max jets
articles.description: United Airlines disclosed Monday one of its largest orders for the Boeing 737 Max jet since the aircraft was grounded in March 2019, agreeing to buy an additional 25 planes.

articles.title: 2,000-pound World War II bomb detonated near university
articles.description: Authorities in Exeter, England, evacuated more than 2,000 homes before detonating a German World War II bomb found at a construction site.

articles.title: US coronavirus numbers coming down, but not enough
articles.description: CNN's John King goes over the current coronavirus numbers from across the nation and takes a closer look at Covid-19 cases leveling off at numbers higher that health officials would like.

articles.description: Hear President Biden's message for US workers looking to unionize ahead of a union vote by Amazon workers in Bessemer, Alabama.

articles.author: Priscilla Alvarez, CNN
articles.title: Families separated at border could reunite in US, Homeland Security secretary says
articles.description: The Biden administration could reunite migrant families separated at the US-Mexico border under former President Donald Trump in the United States, Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas said Monday.

articles.author: Tami Luhby and Katie Lobosco, CNN
articles.title: There's a race to pass the stimulus by March 14. Here's what's at stake
articles.description: Millions of Americans will start running out of pandemic unemployment benefits in just two weeks, putting increased pressure on the Senate to quickly pass its version of President Joe Biden's $1.9 trillion coronavirus relief package.

articles.author: Alex Rogers and Fredreka Schouten, CNN
articles.title: Kinzinger's allies launch super PAC to defend Republicans who impeached Trump
articles.description: Allies of Illinois GOP Rep. Adam Kinzinger have launched a super PAC to support Republicans in 2022 who stood up to then-President Donald Trump after a mob of his supporters attacked the US Capitol in an effort to overturn the 2020 election.
